Title: TortoiseHg
Description: Mirror of the main TortoiseHg project at http://tortoisehg.bitbucket.org/
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Mirror of the main TortoiseHg project at http://tortoisehg.bitbucket.org/

Use https://hg01.codeplex.com/tortoisehg

To clone the repository enter:
hg clone https://hg01.codeplex.com/tortoisehg
